citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00am on
February 13, 2024. Upon arrival, a sign was observed on the front door requesting that visitors call or text. The inspector
called the licensee and left a voicemail message.
At approximately 11:18 AM an adult male came out of the house. He stated that the licensee was not home, the licensee
was coming back that evening, and that he was not authorized to conduct inspections. The inspector left an attempted
inspection flier and business card.
The licensee responded by email that afternoon and indicated she had received the flyer and the business card.
Additional Inspectors:
Ashley AlgerEnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00am on 
February 13, 2024. Upon arrival, a sign was observed on the front door requesting that visitors call or text. The inspector 
called the licensee and left a voicemail message.  
 
At approximately 11:18 AM an adult male came out of the house. He stated that the licensee was not home, the licensee 
was coming back that evening, and that he was not authorized to conduct inspections. The inspector left an attempted 
inspection flier and business card.  
 
The licensee responded by email that afternoon and indicated she had received the flyer and the business card. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Ashley AlgerEnd Section
